Description: You quickly summon a trap of sharp rocks that hurts a creature entering the battle. When a creature is switched into battle, you may use your reaction to make a ranged attack, dealing rock damage to the incoming creature on a hit.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
